uses.from sentence: TD - LSTM uses two LSTM networks to model the preceding and following contexts surrounding the aspect term .

AT - LSTM.from sentence: AT - LSTM combines the sentence hidden states from a LSTM with the aspect term embedding to generate the attention vector .

ATAE - LSTM.from sentence: ATAE - LSTM further extends AT - LSTM by appending the aspect embedding into each word vector .

AF - LSTM.from sentence: AF - LSTM introduces a word - aspect fusion attention to learn associative relationships between aspect and context words .

CNN.from sentence: CNN uses the architecture proposed in without explicitly considering aspect .
